downloadTitle: TechNet Quarter 1 FY08  All Downloadable Downloads
downloadDescription: See how to mazimize your business potential with Microsoft solutions.  TechNet sessions are learning resources designed to meet the needs of IT professionals.
detailsSection:
• ADD-200: New File Server Features of Windows Server 2008

  • ADD-200 Demo 1: Exploring Server Backup

  • ADD-200 Demo 2: Working with Offline Files

  • ADD-200 Demo 3: Configuring Failover Clustering

systemRequirementsSection:
Required disk space: 52 MB
Microsoft Windows Media Player 6.x or later
Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.x or later
MSXML 4.0 SP2
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the file you want to download from the list below.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
